SECTION H4: HAND WASHING Please show us where you and members of your household most often wash their hands. OBSERVATION ONLY: Observed Not in dwelling/plot/yard No permission to see Other reason
Observe presence of water at the place for hand washing. Water is available Water is not available
Observe presence of soap, detergent or other cleansing agent. Bar Soap Detergent (powder/liquid/paste) Liquid soap Ash/mud/sand None
Do you have any soap or detergent in your household for hand washing? Yes No
If yes, can you please show it to me? Bar Soap Detergent (powder/liquid/paste) Liquid soap Ash/mud/sand None
In what situations do you wash your hands with soap? This is an open-ended question. Do not read the answer choices. After the respondent stops listing times, ask “Are there any other situations where you wash your hands with soap?” Keep asking this question until the respondent thinks there are no other times.
Before preparing food Before cooking food Before eating Before feeding a child Before breastfeeding After cleaning a child\'s anas After changing a baby\'s nappy After disposing of children’s feces After you defecate Others( Specify)

SECTION H5: FOOD INSECURITY EXPERIENCE SCALE HOUSEHOLD REFERENCED
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household were worried you would not have enough food to eat because of a lack of money or other resources? (if "yes", go to question Q1a, otherwise go to question Q2) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q1b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q2) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household were unable to eat healthy and nutritious food because of a lack of money or other resources? (if "yes", go to question Q2a, otherwise go to question Q3) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q2b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q3) Yes No Don\'t know Refused

Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q3b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q4) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household had to skip a meal because there was not enough money or other resources to get food? (if "yes", go to question Q4a, otherwise go to question Q5) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q5) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q5) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household ate less than you thought you should because of a lack of money or other resources? (if "yes", go to question Q5a, otherwise go to question Q6) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q5b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (go to question Q6) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when your household ran out of food because of a lack of money or other resources? (if "yes", go to question Q6a, otherwise go to question Q7) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q6b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (if "yes", go to question Q6c, otherwise go to question Q7) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
How often did this happen? (go to question Q7) Rarely Sometimes Often Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household were hungry but did not eat because there was not enough money or other resources for food? (if "yes", go to question Q7a, otherwise go to question Q8) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q7b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (if "yes", go to question Q7c, otherwise go to question Q8) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
How often did this happen? (go to question Q8) Rarely Sometimes Often Don\'t know Refused
During the last 12 months, was there a time when you or others in your household went without eating for a whole day because of a lack of money or other resources? (if "yes", go to question Q8a, otherwise END) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Was this specifically due to the COVID-19 crisis? (go to question Q8b) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
Did this happen in the past 4 weeks (30 days)? (if "yes", go to question Q8c, otherwise END) Yes No Don\'t know Refused
How often did this happen? (END) Rarely Sometimes Often Don\'t know Refused

How long after the birth was (name) bathed for the first time? If “immediately” or less than 1 hour, record ‘000’. If less than 24 hours, record hours. If “1 day” or “next day”, probe: About how many hours after the delivery? If “24 hours”, probe to ensure best estimate of less than 24 hours or 1 day. If 24 hours or more, record days. Immediately/less than 1 hour Hours Days Never bathed Don\'t know/don\'t remember
